Translation: Навіть не знаю. Може продемонструєш йому «смертельного Нельсона», про якого ти казав?

Source string: Could. On such tiny opponent, all blood might drain out earholes.
Translation: Можна. У такої маленької здобичі одразу потече кров із вух.

Source string: AHHHHH!
Translation: А-А-А-А-А!

Source string: Shut up, Benny!
Translation: Замовкни, Бенні!

Source string: On other hand, blood from constricted trunk could rush to tongue.
Translation: З іншого боку, кров з тулуба може линути в язик.

Source string: And?
Translation: І?

Source string: Tongue swells, pops. Most blood drains back down throat.
Translation: Язик набрякне й лусне. Більшість крові потече вниз по горлу.

Source string: Interesting.
Translation: Цікавенько.

Source string: Less mess that way. Mouth stuffed with giant tongue can't scream--so quieter.
Translation: Так зручніше. З гігантським язиком у роті він не зможе кричати. Буде тиша і спокій.

Source string: Shut up, Benny.
Translation: Замовкни, Бенні.

Source string: You have something less drastic?
Translation: Може є щось менш радикальне?

Source string: Could use Half Deadly Nelson.
Translation: Можна спробувати «напівсмертельного Нельсона».

Source string: What's that?
Translation: Що це?

Source string: Like Deadly Nelson but less dying.
Translation: Як «смертельний Нельсон», але менш смертельний.

Source string: How much less?
Translation: Наскільки менш?

Source string: Half.
Translation: На половину.

Source string: What happens the other half of the time?
Translation: А що відбувається всю другу половину?

Source string: Opponent lives, spends rest of short life praying for death.
Translation: Опонент виживає, але до кінця своїх недовгих днів благає про смерть.

Source string: HEY! Can you hear me down there? Maloof?
Translation: ГЕЙ! Ви мене чуєте там унизу? Малуфе?

Source string: Seriously, Maloof, I apologize. Call off your goon and I'll never bother you again. Ever.
Translation: Малуфе, я щиро вибачаюся. Відкликай свого бугая і я тебе більше ніколи не потурбую. Ніколи.

Source string: The thing is, Benny, you're never gonna bother me again either way.
Translation: Розумієш, Бенні, ти мене що так, що так більше ніколи не потурбуєш.

Source string: So you're gonna have to offer something a lot better than that.
Translation: Тому доведеться запропонувати щось краще.

Source string: Like what?
Translation: Наприклад?

Source string: Any ideas, Mikhail?
Translation: Є варіанти, Міхаїле?

Source string: Know anything about giant, hairless bear?
Translation: Чув щось про здорового, лисого ведмедя?

Source string: No...
Translation: Ні...

Source string: Out of ideas. Preparing Nelson.
Translation: Тоді без варіантів. Готую «Нельсона».

Source string: Well wait! Wait! Uh, maybe--uh, yeah, m--maybe I did see something like that. Give me a minute to think.
Translation: Почекай! Чекай! Е-е, може... е... так, м-може я і бачив такого. Дай-но хвилинку подумати.

Source string: You ready to talk, Benny?
Translation: Ну що, розповіси, Бенні?

Source string: Hold on. It'll come to me.
Translation: Заждіть. Зараз згадаю.

Source string: Hey, Raz. You mind coming back later? We're taking care of a little business.
Did you ladies know one of the bloodiest battles of the Civil War was fought on the shore of this very lake?
Yup, it's true.
It happened back when this place was still an Indian summer camp and burial ground.
A group of Union soldiers got separated from their regiment.
Night was falling and they were cold and scared... Of Dracula! BOO! Huh-hahaha!
Uhm, I'm kidding. They were just terrified of getting shot.
Though I'm sure any of them with any sense were afraid of Dracula too.
They stumbled across an old building--you can still see it on the far side of the lake.
So they decided to spend the night there.
Little did they know it was...
An abandoned Indian insane asylum built on a caveman burial ground!
Little did they also know that a cursed fish lived in the asylum.
And that he was an escaped lunatic.
But from a different asylum.
So even though he was actually living in an asylum, he was still counted as escaped.
And what was his curse you ask?
Where his gills should have been...
He. Had. Hooks!
Yup, and where one of the hooks should have been...
He. Had. A. Lung! Yup... a lung!
And instead of being about fourteen inches long.
He. Was. Ten. Feet. Tall.
But that wasn't the scariest thing.
The scariest thing...
The absolute scariest thing...
And the thing that still makes the old timers' blood turn to ice and vice versa...
Is the part I said first about how he had hooks for gills.
Oh… Brrrrrr.
Uh, anybody need a hug?
Anybody?
No?
Okay, then. Anybody mind if I tell that story again?
Speak up now if you don't want to hear it again.
Here we go...
Not now, Raz, I'm in the middle of a story.
TeeeVeee.
Hackey saaaaaack...
Yesss, hackey saaaack.
Oh no! They're all brainless!
Hi Raz!
Vernon! You're okay!
Yeah, we're great. Me and my pals Kitty and Franke are just hanging out tellin' stories and watchin' the boob tube.
TeeeVeeeee.
Vernon, look at them. They're zombies.
It did seem kind of weird when they let me get this close to them.
And then they didn't mind when I talked all through the show.
Kitty even agreed to go on a date with me more or less--we're gonna play hackey sack!
Keep an eye on them Vernon.
I'm gonna go figure out what's causing this!
Roger that, Raz.
I don't care how long you two have been "pardners." James is my boyfriend now. Do you know what that means?
Uh, well, he wears his good parade chaps a lot more.
Yes, he's less filthy. That's part of it.
But the biggest change is that he can't possibly waste as much time as he used to hanging out with his loser friends.
I don't like you.
And I don't like you. So that covers everything we have in common.
Now for the differences: I'm going to be with James all the time from now on.
You're going to have to stay as far away from us as possible or I'm going to make your life more miserable than I imagine it already is.
I can't quite make it out, but something... something coming out of those speakers reminds me of my nightmare.
What are you listening to?
You know Chloe, for a chick whose face I can't see because she's always wearing a helmet, you're pretty cute.
I'm not human, earth primate.
But you are the girl model of whatever it is you are, right?
Affirmative.
At this point, that's totally close enough.
Man, what smells like butt? Oh, hey Nils.  How 'bout you and your butt and its odor take a hike before I puke?
But...
It'd be a real shame if you had to leave your butt here because it was anchored to my foot. NOW BEAT IT!
Hi Chloe.  How's it... I mean... You know, what's up and stuff?
Bobby, we need to work on you a little.
So this is it.
Yep.
I'm so happy Clem.
Me too, Crystal.
It's going to be great isn't it?
Super great.
We're going to be so powerful, aren't we?
More powerful than you can imagine.
Sigh. I can't wait.
The sunset's beautiful, isn't it?
It will be more beautiful afterwards.
When we've done what we're going to do.
Yes. When we've finished the project.
The people down there look like ants, don't they?
They are ants, Crystal. Cruel, cruel little ants.
Oh, Clem. It's not their fault.
Still, they're gonna be sorry.
Yes, that's true. They will all be sorry.
Hey is that Nils down there with Chloe?
Whoa. That's weird.
Oh, man. I've got to tell Elka.
What's the point?
I guess soon there won't be much point to any of this, will there?
Not when we've finished...
The project.
Yes.
You hear about Elton and Milka?
No, what?
Totally a couple now.
No way. I thought Elton loved Lili?
Shyeah, well, and I thought Milka loved Quentin.
Well, I guess if peoples' love was something you could trust, we wouldn't be here now, would we?
Good point as always, Clem.
Well, are you ready?
Just one more minute.
Let's just watch the sun until it sets.
All right. Let's let people have one last sunset before things change forever.
...forever...
Hey did I hear you guy's writing another cheer?
Um...
Yessiree.
It's a SECRET cheer!
Yeah! Super secret!
But soon, you'll hear it!
It will be on everybody's lips!
It'll be the talk of the town!
Hm. Uh, okay. I guess I'll just wait for it's big debut.
Yes. The big debut. It's going to be great!
THE GREATEST EVER!!!
See you later.
Bye!
Hey is that new secret cheer done yet?
Sundown. We're going to debut it at sundown.
Yeah, don't worry. You'll hear about it!
What's going on, JT?
Gosh darnit, flannel mouth, I'm tryin' to hear what them two's sayin'.
Enjoy!
Yeah, yeah, see ya later
Hey nosy, how 'bout pulling your big beak out of our private business?
Hey, butt out!
Translation: Гей, відвали!

Source string: Can't lurk forever, bear
Mmm. An eager one. Eager to learn, I wonder? Or just eager to play?
Translation: М-м. Жага тебе прям розпирає. Цікаво, чи це жага вчитися? Чи просто побавитись?

Source string: Sir, I am here to learn, sir!
Translation: Сер, я тут, щоб учитися, сер!

Source string: You're here to train hard?  Hmmm?
Translation: Ти тут, щоб тренуватися, не покладаючи рук? Гм-м-м?

Source string: Yes sir!
Translation: Так, сер!

Source string: Develop a skill?
Translation: Розвинути свої навички?

Source string: To become part of a noble team?
Translation: Стати частиною благородної команди?

Source string: Yes--
Translation: Так...

Source string: Yes, to become...
Translation: Так, стати...

Source string: Yes!
Translation: Так!

Source string: ...a janitor!
Translation: Прибиральником!

Source string: No. What? I'm here to be a Psychonaut!
Translation: Ні. Що? Я тут, щоб стати психонавтом!

Source string: Oh, fft!
Translation: А, тю!

Source string: Oh, the brainy jubjub goes on upstairs.
Translation: Мозкова абракадабра далі по коридору.

Source string: Down here it's pushin' brooms, not bendin' spoons!
Translation: Ми тут підмітаємо, а не ложки згинаємо!

Source string: Heh heh.
Translation: Хе-хе.

Source string: Hey, Mr. Cruller, do you know where Sasha's Nein's lab is?
Translation: Гей, пане Круллер, ви не знаєте, де лабораторія Саші Найна?

Source string: What? Huh? Secret underground lab? I don't have a secret underground lab! That's hobgoberish!
Translation: А? Що? Секретна підземна лабораторія? Нема в мене секретної підземної лабораторії! Що за нісенітниці!

Source string: Now beat it! Git!
Translation: Іди звідси! Киш!

Source string: Stop staring at my mops!
Translation: Годі витріщатися на мої швабри!

Source string: Agent Vodello! I have been ordered to report here for Levitation training!
Translation: Агентко Воделло! Я прибув за наказом учитися левітації!

Source string: I've already done the Coach's obstacle course, and Sasha showed me how to shoot!
Translation: Я вже пройшов смугу перешкод тренера, а Саша навчив мене стріляти!

Source string: Agent Nein said you were the most powerful levitator the Psychonauts had.
Translation: Агент Найн сказав, що ви найпотужніша левітаторка за всі історію Психонавтів.

Source string: It's gotta be today! My parents come tomorrow!
Well you know, I only work with the best teachers.
Translation: Ну, знаєте, я ж працюю лише з найкращими вчителями.

Source string: Jeez, what's going on?
This way to Lake Oblongata.
It says the Main Lodge is this way.
Basic Braining Today, 0600 hours, Coach Oleander's Classroom.
Geodesic Psycho-Isolation Chamber. Stay out!
It looks like it points to the campfire area.
What're you guys doing?
Translation: Що ви робите?

Source string: Beat it, new kid.
Translation: Вали звідси, новачку.

Source string: What's that round thing up on the dock?
Translation: Що то за кругла штука на пристані?

Source string: That thing? Oh, man, lemme tell you about that thing. That thing is... none of your stinkin' business.
Translation: Та штука? О-о, слухай уважно, я розповім. Та штука це... не твоя собача справа.

Source string: Mind if I scoot by?
Not if you don't mind my fist scooting into your neck.
Do you know where I'm supposed to be?
If you bother us again, you're gonna be on a helicopter getting life-flighted to the hospital.
I don't think you guys are so tough.
Why don't you try me, Goggle-girl?
Hey, Mr. Cruller. Can I take out a canoe?
Translation: Гей, пане Круллер. Можна мені поплавати на каное?

Source string: Mr. Who?
Translation: Пане «хто»?

Source string: You WILL call me Admiral, son. And, no, you can't charter a vessel.
Translation: Для тебе я АДМІРАЛ, синку. І ні, ти не можеш зафрахтувати судно.

Source string: Not without an Oarsman's Badge!
Translation: Не без нашивки весляра!

Source string: Excuse me, Admiral?
Eh?
Where can I get an Oarsman's Badge? I'd really like to take out a canoe.
Gotta get it from one of the official camp counselors. I can't have just anybody in my fleet.
Check it out, Admiral! I'm an Oarsman, First Class!
Translation: Погляньте, адмірале! Тепер я першокласний весляр!

Source string: Hey, it looks like all those weeks in the canoe simulator really paid off!
Translation: Виходить, не дарма стирчав три тижні в симуляторі каное!

Source string: Uh, yessir, Admiral, sir!
Translation: Е-е, так точно, сер-адмірал!

Source string: Well, let's get you afloat!
Translation: Ну тоді, всі на борт!

Source string: Uh, Admiral, where's that canoe again?
Can't find the ship, eh? Well, well, you're not off to a promising start, Seaman.
It's right outside. You can't miss it. Well, most people couldn't miss it.
Excuse me, Mr. Ranger, but I'm looking for Sasha Nein's lab?
Translation: Перепрошую, пане рейнджер. Не підкажете, де лабораторія Саші Найна?

Source string: Well, now even if I knew where it was, and if it were down here, and even if you were very, very close to it right now, you shouldn't be poking around here!
Translation: Ну, навіть якби я знав де вона, навіть якби вона була десь тут, навіть якби ти був дуже-дуже близько до неї, це не скасовує того, що не треба тут ходити!

Source string: This forest is off limits!
Translation: Дітям в ліс не можна!

Source string: Now git!
Translation: Геть звідси!

Source string: Excuse me, Mr. Ranger, but I'm looking for Milla Vodello's Levitation class?
She teaches out on the docks, in the sunshine, where young kids should be spending their summers! Not here in the forests!
Which, have I mentioned, are off limits?
Hey, I can levitate. Want to see my merit badge?
Uh, that's great! You can just float up on out of this forest then!
Because the forest? It's off limits!
I-I told ya! Get up that big tree over yonder and get into Coach Oleander's class so he can start tormenting ya!
So, you don't know where Sasha's lab is?
I told ya, I ain't got no secret lab!
Oh, that German fella?
Oh he's dug in under the GPC over there.
...I'm learning some advanced techniques from Sasha Nein right now.
You ever clean out a jailhouse bathroom with nothing but a pair of underwear and three bottles of diet lemonade?
Yes.
Maybe.
No.
That's a REAL advanced technique.
You let me know when you're done with your little zippy-zappy head games and we'll get ya to some extreme mopping. Okay?
Hey, wanna see me shoot something?
Ya wanna see me wring your neck like a mop?
Ah, dang.
...I'm learning Levitation!
Now, you go take a canoe out to that pretty lady in the lake, if you wanna start flying around like a crazy person.
The only thing I use bubbles for here is moppin'!
Hey, Mr. Cruller! I'm a trained Levitator now!
You have to admit, that would come in handy to clean those high up type places.
Ahh-Ffft! I could go up to the store in the main lodge and buy a Cobweb Duster that would do the same thing.
Levitation!
Mr. Cruller?
Ah, so you're finally ready to begin your janitor training! Hmmm?
Um, almost, but as a practice for that...
Where did you--
Under the GPC! Maybe it's your ears I should be moppin'!
I'm learning some advanced techniques from Sasha Nein right now.
You let me know when you're done with the little zippy-zappy head games and we'll get to some extra mopping. Okay?
Hey, wanna watch me shoot something?
You wanna see me wring your neck like a mop?
Hey, after I learn Levitation, I could maybe help you get up to higher places to clean.
Now, that's the first sensible thing you've said all day.
That's really catchy!
Thanks a lot, man.
You guys are excellent!
Mighty kind of you to say.
Wow. Sweet!
Glad ya like it.
Seriously, you guys really sound good.
Doggone it, Raz, we're tryin' to play here.
Whatcha doin' there?
Translation: Що поробляєте?

Source string: We're making friendship bracelets. You know, for our "friends."
Translation: Ми робимо дружні браслети. Знаєш, для наших «друзів».

Source string: Hey, is that my name on that one?
Not unless your name is Franke. Or Kitty.
Oh, I guess I saw an "R" and... and an "A"...
What's your name again, kid? Spaz?
My name's Raz.
Well, Spaz, why don't you go bother someone else.
Can I ask you guys a question?
Ummmm... hmmmm... no.
Hey Maloof, can I join in?
Sorry, Raz. This our thing.
Come on, Maloof, give me a chance.
You're a nice circus boy. You don't want to get mixed up in our business.
I just wanted to play too.
Someday--and that day may never come--I will call upon you to toss me a ball or build a fort out of refrigerator boxes.
Hey--
I have a sentimental weakness for you, Raz. But you talk when you should listen.
Hey Vernon, what's up?
I'm looking for Dogen, Elka, and Milka.
Any luck finding those guys, Vernon?
Nope, not yet.
Excuse me--
Translation: Даруйте...

Source string: I told you them burgers ain't ready!!!
Translation: Я ж казав, котлети не готові!!!

Source string: Uh, no you didn't.
Translation: Е-е, ні, не казали.

Source string: The coals ain't hot! They're not going to be done for a while. Maybe a week.
Translation: Плита ще навіть не розігрілася! Чекати доведеться довго. Може тиждень.

Source string: A week?
Translation: Тиждень?

Source string: They're backordered. I'm the only one back here! These things take time.
Translation: Усі замовлення приймаються заздалегідь. Я тут сам пашу! Роботи в мене вагон.

Source string: I don't even want a hamburger!
Translation: Та не потрібні мені ваші котлети!

Source string: Oh, well why didn't you say so?
Translation: Ой, так чого ти одразу не сказав?

Source string: So what DO you want?
Translation: Тоді ЩО ж ти хочеш?

Source string: Hey, where's my hamburger?
Translation: Гей, де мій гамбургер?

Source string: Grrr! I told you--
Translation: Гр-р! Я ж казав...

Source string: Just kidding! I just want to buy stuff.
Translation: Жартую! Я прийшов закупитися.

Source string: Don't push me, Sonny. I can reach you with this spatula.
Translation: Не доводь мене, синку. А то як дам тобі лопаткою.

Source string: Hey, anything new in the store?
Take a look.
Now leave me alone. I'm cooking!
Hey, how'd you get out here?
I'm supposed to be here! I'm the Ranger!
You're the one who shouldn't be out here, Sonny.
This part of the woods is, uh... its not normal, see. Not safe.
I've seen some things... ohhh... and I've heard some things...
Like that? Ya hear that?
Now get yourself up to the main lodge and stay by the fire where it's safe.
Finest of the fleet!
Translation: Це гордість нашого флоту!

Source string: I'll take good care of her, sir!
Translation: Вона в надійних руках, сер!

Source string: Now don't take 'er out too far!
Translation: Тільки за буйки не запливай!

Source string: That lake isn't as peaceful or as harmless as she looks, mm-hmm...
Translation: Це озеро не настільки тихе й мирне, яким здається на перший погляд, еге...

Source string: Aren't you guys going to Coach Oleander's class?
Translation: Ви ж ідете на урок тренера Олеандра?

Source string: Are you kidding? A kid got killed in that class last year.
Translation: Ти жартуєш? На ньому минулого року загинула дитина.

Source string: I heard it was a bunch of kids, Phoebe.
Translation: Чув, що навіть не одна, Фібі.

Source string: Well, I heard it was a bunch of blind kids, and the Coach threw 'em off a cliff.
Translation: Наче це була купка сліпих дітей, і тренер скинув їх зі скелі.

Source string: Yeah... because they were late for class.
Translation: Ага... всього лиш через те, що вони запізнилися на урок.

Source string: You'd better hurry, kid! Now, where were we, Quentin?
Translation: Краще поквапся, хлопче! Тож, на чому ми там зупинилися, Квентіне?

Source string: Hey! No playin' hooky on my watch!  Ehhh.
Class is the other way! Now git!
Boyfriend? *Boyfriend?*
Owwwwww.
Translation: А-а-а-ай-й-й.

Source string: Ugh!
Translation: Ах!

Source string: Oof!
Translation: Уф!

Source string: Yow!
Translation: Ой!

Source string: I had no idea you were at such a remedial level.
Translation: Я й гадки не мав, що ти настільки відстаєш від програми.

Source string: Hey!
Translation: Гей!

Source string: Lucky for you, we have one of the world's foremost levitators on staff.
Translation: Але тобі пощастило, що серед нашого персоналу є одна з найкращих левітаторок світу.

Source string: Agent Milla Vodello, the Mental Minx!
Translation: Агентка Мілла Воделло, ментальна милосердниця!

Source string: Precisely. You'll need this Oarsman's Badge to reach her at the docks.
Translation: Саме так. Тобі знадобиться нашивка весляра, щоб дістатися її на пристані.

Source string: I'll try to determine where this interference is coming from.
Translation: Я поки спробую визначити, звідки йде втручання.

Source string: Return when you've earned your Levitation Merit Badge.
Translation: Повертайся, коли заслужиш нашивку левітації.

Source string: But I have to climb that creepy tower and save Dogen from an insane dentist!
Translation: Але ж мені треба піднятися на ту вежу й врятувати Доґена від шаленого стоматолога!

Source string: Patience Razputin. Go see Milla at the docks and perhaps we will get to the top of that tower... and the bottom of your nightmare.
Translation: Терпіння, Разпутіне. Сходи до Мілли й ти зможеш дістатися вершини тієї вежі... на дні свого нічного жаху.

Source string: Dude, you're grossing me out.
Ughhh.
Uhhh.  Step away, soldier.
Back off, soldier!
Leave me alone, Private!
Get out of my face, soldier!
Hhhuuuhhh.
Will you shut up!
(Sigh) Dude.
Translation: (зітхає) Чуваче.

Source string: No way, you're the best.  That was good.
Translation: Та не верзи, ти найкраща. Добре вийшло.

Source string: I'm telling you for the last time, no!
Translation: Кажу вам востаннє, ні!

Source string: I would never do that. I could never...
Translation: Я б ніколи так не вчинив. Я б ніколи не...

Source string: ...KILL EVERYONE.
Translation: ПОВБИВАВ УСІХ.

Source string: Oh... hi Raz!
Translation: О... привіт, Разе!

Source string: Squirrel trouble?
Translation: Білки докучають?

Source string: They're liars is all. Whatever they tell you, it's a lie.
Translation: Вони всі — брехуни. Усе, що вони кажуть — брехня.

Source string: I'll take your word for it.
Translation: Вірю на слово.

Source string: You going to class?
Translation: Ідеш на урок?

Source string: Yeah, I'll meet you up there. As soon as I get these guys to shut up!
Translation: Так, я тебе дожену. Як тільки заткну їх!

Source string: Hey, why aren't you guys in Coach Oleander's class?
Translation: До речі, а чого це ви не на уроці тренера Олеандра?

Source string: Why don't you take a picture. It'll last longer.
Translation: Може краще сфотографуєш? Буде легше передивлятися.

Source string: Whoops. Sorry.
Translation: Упс. Вибач.

Source string: Hey, where you going, Maloof?
Translation: Гей, куди це ти, Малуфе?

Source string: Shhhh! I snuck out. That class is a death trap for crazy people!
Translation: Тс-с-с! Я втік. Той урок — це пастка для божевільних!

Source string: Listen, the Coach is strong. At the start of class he pulls you into his mind, and then there's nothing you can do about it.
Translation: Слухай, не слід недооцінювати тренера. Бо на початку уроку він затягує тебе у свій розум, хочеш ти цього чи ні.

Source string: But once you're in, you can use these Smelling Salts to sneak out.
Translation: Але з розуму можна втекти за допомогою нюхальної солі.

Source string: Take mine. I don't need them anymore. I'm calling my parents to come get me, before I get hurt.
Translation: Бери мою. Вона мені вже не знадобиться. Я телефоную батькам, щоб забрали мене звідси, поки не пізно.

Source string: Too late!
Translation: Вже якраз пізно!

Source string: Bobby! Ahh!
Translation: Боббі! А-а-а!

Source string: Hey, kid. You owe me five arrowheads for this week's protection service.
Translation: Малий, ти винен мені п'ять наконечників за те, що я прикривав тебе.

Source string: Cough it up, Ma-loser, or you'll be coughing up bloody tears.
Translation: Плати, Ма-лузер, а інакше поплатишся власною кров'ю.

Source string: Hey, leave him alone.
Translation: Гей, облиш вже його.

Source string: I heard a rumor that you were raised in the circus. Well, let me put this in terms you'll understand. I'm the Strong Man around here.
Translation: Мені тут донесли, що ти виріс у цирку. Тому поясню твоєю мовою. Важковаговик тут я.

Source string: Really? Because you look more like the cotton candy.
Translation: Справді? Бо в тебе голова мов цукрова вата.

Source string: (Gasp!)
Translation: (здивування)

Source string: Benny, put this kid's death on my to-do list.
Translation: Бенні, запиши в мій список справ, що його треба грохнути.

Source string: Come on, we'll see him in class.
Translation: Та ми ж з ним перетнемося на уроці.

Source string: Yeah, we'll settle this on the battlefield.
Translation: Ага. Усе вирішиться на полі бою.

Source string: Nuh-uh!
Translation: Нє-а!

Source string: I told you!
Translation: Я ж сказав!

Source string: The rest of camp is off limits, until you have a Basic Braining Merit Badge.
Translation: До решти табору не можна, поки в тебе нема нашивки «мозкового штурму».

Source string: You know where this button is from, Coach?
Translation: Ви часом не знаєте, звідки цей ґудзик, тренере?

Source string: Hey, you stole a button from the Geodesic Psychoisolation Chamber!
Translation: Гей, ти вкрав його з геодезичної психоізоляційної камери!

Source string: No, I didn't! I--Bobby Zilch gave it to me.
Translation: Ні, це не так! Я... Боббі Зілч мені його дав.

Source string: Shoulda known. That kid spends more time in the cooler than in school.
Translation: Так і знав. Він в ізоляторі сидить більше, ніж на уроках.

Source string: Reminds me of myself when I was his age.
Translation: Я в його віці теж такий був.

Source string: Well, go put it back!
Translation: Хай там як, поверни її на місце!

Source string: Find 'em yet?
Hey, Coach. Where IS the G--
Translation: Гей, тренере. А де ця гео...

Source string: Don't you know how to use your map?
Translation: На мапу дивитись не пробував?

Source string: Right! Yes! Sorry!
Translation: Точно! Так! Вибачте!

Source string: Press {JournalButton} to access JOURNAL and MAP.
Translation: МАПУ можна знайти в ЖУРНАЛІ, натиснувши {JournalButton}

Source string: Hey, if you have one of these buttons too, we could play tiddlywinks.
Translation: Гей, якщо у вас знайдеться ще один ґудзик, ми могли б зіграти в «блошки».

Source string: If I had one of those buttons, I could kill you with it in six seconds.
Translation: Якби в мене був такий ґудзик, я б убив тебе ним протягом шести секунд.

Source string: I'm hunting the most dangerous prey of all.
MAN.
This button look familiar to you?

Oh, man. That's from the Geodesic Psychoisolation Chamber. That reminds me of this time I was stuck in there for three days straight. The first ten minutes weren't bad, but then the second five were pretty scary. I was delirious for the three after that. And then--
Hey, I think I see Elka over there!
Where?
I think this button is a clue to the location of Sasha Nein's secret lab.
Translation: Думаю, цей ґудзик є підказкою до розташування секретної лабораторії Саші Найна.

Source string: Really? Hang on. I'll use my power of Clairvoyance on it to see if he's got any ladies in there.
Translation: Справді? Стривай, я застосую на нього яснобачення й подивлюсь, чи є в там десь дівчата.

Source string: Nope. Just Maloof. And he's crying. I've heard that's what happens to kids who go for Sasha's advanced training too early.
Translation: Нє-а. Лише Малуф. І він плаче. Чув, що таке нерідко трапляється з дітьми, які зарано йдуть на тренування Саші.

Source string: Hey, Dogen! I got a secret for you.
Translation: Гей, Доґене! Хочеш, розповім секрет?

Source string: (...whisper-whisper...)
Translation: (шепотіння...)

Source string: ...Nils...
Translation: Нільс...

Source string: Hey, not fair! Whispering is so rude!
Translation: Гей, так не чесно! Неввічливо шепотіти!

Source string: What did he tell you, Dogen?
Translation: Що він тобі там наплів, Доґене?

Source string: Hey, look at this button I found on Nils' bunk.
It looks like it came off a girl's dress.
I don't care.
Looks like it was just torn off by force!
It's got little teeth marks on it!
GET THAT THING OUT OF MY FACE BEFORE I SHOVE IT IN YOUR EYE SOCKET AND SEW IT TO YOUR BRAIN!
Nils kisses girls on the mouth and likes it.
Why don't you just take off your hat and kill me, Dogen?
I dunno.
But I need to get to Sasha Nein's secret lab!
Where'd you get your clothes? Because my sister, she's kind of fat and she has so much trouble finding good stuff.
WHAT?
I said, do you know where Sasha's secret lab is?
Why don't you go talk to someone who likes you, and leave us alone?
Hey, look. I got a button. Can I join your little craft club?
Hey, look. I got an ugly face. Can I join your ugly club?
Uh, Franke. Let me handle the insults, okay?
Hey, look! My Dad's poor and I was raised in the circus. Can I join the Psychonauts?
Dang, Kitty. You're the best!
Hey, look. I got a button. Everybody says you guys suck.
Hey, I got this button from Sasha Nein, and I have to give it back. Do you know where his secret lab is?
Translation: Гей, цей ґудзик дав мені Саша Найн, але я маю його повернути. Не знаєш, де його секретна лабораторія?

Source string: Do not know. Why not ask foxy girlfriend over there?
Translation: Без поняття. Може спитаєш свою єхидну дівчину?

Source string: Again with the girlfriend thing. Listen--
Translation: Та чому одразу «свою»? Слухай...

Source string: Hey, just kidding. Mikhail know women good for only one thing!
Translation: Жартую. Міхаїл знає, що жінки годяться лише для одного!

Source string: WRESTLING.
Translation: РЕСЛІНГУ.

Source string: Unless have skinny arms like your girlfriend. Then out of luck.
Translation: Але якщо в них такі худорляві руки, як у твоєї, тоді не пощастило.

Source string: Hey, who is that?
Translation: Гей, хто там?

Source string: Raz is that you? It's me! Maloof!
Translation: Разе, це ти? Це я! Малуф!

Source string: Hang on, buddy. Give me a sec to pop this tin can.
Translation: Тримайся, друже. Зараз я відкрию цю бляшанку.

Source string: Thanks! I thought I was going to have to eat my own arm.
Translation: Дякую! Я думав, що мені доведеться відгризти собі руку.

Source string: Okay, this is dumb. There's no way I can break open that big, steel hut with this little button.
Translation: Ні, якась дурня. Я ні за що не зламаю цей сталевий купол малесеньким ґудзиком.

Source string: Hey, Lili. Do you know where Sasha Nein's secret lab is?
Translation: Гей, Лілі. Не знаєш часом, де секретна лабораторія Саші Найна?

Source string: Secret? It's printed on your map, duh!
Translation: У сенсі секретна? Вона ж відмічена на мапі!

Source string: Oh, I knew that. I was just curious if YOU knew where Sasha Nein's lab was.
Translation: Ох, ну я це і так знав. Я просто перевіряв, чи знаєш ТИ, де його лабораторія.

Source string: Because I do.
Translation: Бо я от знаю.

Source string: Uh-huh.
Translation: Ага.

Source string: Press {JournalButton} to view JOURNAL and MAP.
Want to measure my wrist? Just in case.
Translation: Хочеш поміряти мій зап'ясток? Про всяк випадок.

Source string: Mm, no.
Translation: М-м, ні.

Source string: Hey, if you were going to make a friendship bracelet, you could maybe use this button here.
Translation: Слухай, якби ти захотіла зробити браслет дружби, ти б могла пришити цей ґудзик.

Source string: Why? So you could unbutton it and take it off when you got tired of being friends with me?
Translation: Навіщо? Щоб ти міг відірвати його, коли тобі набридне зі мною дружити?

Source string: Who said you were making it for me?
Translation: А хто казав, що браслет для мене?

Source string: Uhhh--
You know, if you were going to shut up, you could use that button on your lip. How about that?
Translation: Знаєш, якщо колись надумаєш замовкнути, можеш зашити собі рот цим ґудзиком. Як тобі таке?

Source string: Jeez.
Translation: Боже.

Source string: Ah ha ha!
Ow ha ah!
Look who's still punching!
Oh god. What have I done?
Hey! I'll bet you can't write a cheer about this red button.
Wanna bet?
You're on!
Red button is the best!
It fastens up my vest!
If it breaks like the rest,
The boys will see my chest!
Hey, you're that new kid, ain't ya?
Translation: Гей, ось і наш новоспечений кадет.

Source string: Well, I'm doing some advanced training right now as a matter of fact, so I don't think "New Kid" is really a name that you want to get too used to saying.
Translation: Ну, я вже перейшов до тренувань просунутого рівня, тому не думаю, що вам варто звикати до терміну «новоспечений».

Source string: Hold on there. You're not doing Sasha Nein's advanced training that he does in his secret, underground lab are you?
Translation: Притримай коней. Тільки не кажи, що ти йдеш на додаткові заняття Саші Найна, які він проводить у своїй секретній підземній лабораторії.

Source string: Hidden deep within the iron walls of the GPC where no one can hear you screaming?
Translation: Захованій глибоко за залізними стінами ГПК, де ніхто не почує твої крики?

Source string: Why, yes I am.
Translation: Так, саме в ній.

Source string: Sakes alive!
Translation: Хай Бог милує!

Source string: Well, nice knowing you.
Translation: Що ж, раді знайомству.

Source string: Hey, I brought you a new guitar pick. Look.
Aw, quit foolin'. That's just a button you took from the GPC across the creek.
Probably radioactive.
Dang! Git that outta here!
Hey, look, Chloe. I found a tiny, red space ship.
Nice fake Trynaxian Cruiser, Raz. But if you'd done even the most basic research, you'd know that real Trynaxian Cruisers have SIX viewports on top, not four.
Well I guess you just haven't seen THIS YEAR'S Trynaxian Cruiser then.
The Trynaxian galaxy exploded 400 years ago.
Oh my god. This must be really valuable then.
HEY!
Ay!
Hey, check out this weird button!
Translation: Гей, погляньте, який дивний ґудзик!

Source string: Gah! No! Don't put me back in there! Please! I'll be good!
Translation: А-а! Ні! Я більше не хочу туди! Будь ласка! Я виправлюсь!

Source string: Hey, boss! Boss! What's wrong?
Translation: Гей, босе! Босе! Що не так?

Source string: Uh, nothing. It's just, that button reminds me of a bad place. That's all.
Translation: Е-е, нічого. Просто мені цей ґудзик нагадав про одне кепське місце. От і все.

Source string: You heard the man. Get that button outta here!
Translation: Чув його? Прибери до біса цей ґудзик!

Source string: Why I oughtta...
Translation: Та я тебе зараз...

Source string: Simmer down there, Phoebe. You promised Milla you wouldn't burn any more kids.
Translation: Охолонь, Фібі. Ти пообіцяла Міллі, що більше не спалиш жодну дитину.

Source string: Grr. Okay.
Translation: Гр-р. Нехай.

Source string: Hey, just pretend this is a lighter.
Translation: Е-е, уявіть, що це запальничка.

Source string: It's red.
Translation: Червоний, як вогонь.

Source string: Pretty inspiring, eh?
Translation: Глибоко, чи не так?

Source string: This mean anything to you?
Ah yes.
So? Sew red buttons on your underwear!
What does that mean? How will that help me find Sasha's lab?
How the heck do I know? It's just one of those things us old people like to say!
What can I buy with this button?
Translation: Що можна купити за цей ґудзик?

Source string: We only take arrowheads here, kid.
Translation: Ми приймаємо тільки наконечники, хлопче.

Source string: 100% pure Psitanium arrowheads. Squeezed from the ground like magical pimples popped out of Mother Earth's own back.
Translation: Наконечники з чистого пситанію. Видавлені з ґрунту немов магічні прищі зі спини самої Матінки-Землі.

Source string: Ew.
Translation: Фу.

Source string: Okay, here's my Oarsman's Badge.
I'm not THAT blind, you little rat. Now beat it until you get the real thing.
Looks like you got that little patch of dirt pretty well raked.
Shush! I'm lookin' for my contact lens!
Hey, do you know where this button belongs?
I know where it DOESN'T belong. It doesn't belong HERE in these off-limit woods! Just like you. Now g--
Oh. Wait. That's from the GPC. It DOES belong down here in these off-limit woods. Hmmm.
But you don't! So git!
Well, I tracked Dogen into the forest, but his footprints just... disappeared.
Really?
Yeah, and I tried to tag Elka, but she punched me.
I saw Milka run into this cave, so all I have to do now is wait.
Why don't you just run in there?
Never follow a snake into its hole, Raz. That is the code of the mongoose. The code of the hunter.
How's it going Mongoose?
Everything is falling into place. We're moving into the endgame.
Dogen!
Yeah, good idea. You rest here while I find your brains!
Hey, I didn't know you guys were friends.
Small Maloof and I have arrangement.
Instead of beating up bears, I get to beat up anyone who picks on Maloof.
What?
Unbelievable, no? And he's not even charging me.
A lot of things are going to change around here, Razputin.
A power shift. Some big figures will be going down. Some new stars rising.
For the meek, justice. For the abusers of power, wedgies and Indian burns.
Choose your sides wisely.
Gah!
No one touch Maloof any more!
Mmm.
Let him go, Mikhail. He did me a favor once.
For that, he gets a one-day free ride.
You're lucky the boss is generous today.
Oof. Thanks.
(Gasp.)
Translation: (зойкає)

Source string: There she is!
Translation: Ось і вона!

Source string: And there you are, darling!
Translation: Ось і ти, серденько!

Source string: Don't worry, I got in contact with your father, and he's going to be here tomorrow to pick you up!
Translation: Не переймайся, я вже зв'язалася з твоїм татом. Уже завтра він приїде та забере тебе!

Source string: My... father?
Translation: Моїм... татом?

Source string: Ooh, got to go! The race is starting!
Translation: О-ох, ну все, я побігла! Перегони починаються!

Source string: Care to give it a try?
Okay...
What the?
Don't make me go get my fish friend again.
Pfff! I ain't afraid of no Lungfish. Come on and get me, stupid Lungfish.
Oooh! Look at me! I can breathe!
Big deal! So can I!
Don't be a stranger, darling.
Translation: Рада зустрічі, серденько.

Source string: Thank you, Agent Vodello.
Translation: Дякую, агентко Воделло.

Source string: Now it's back to the lab to save Dogen.
Translation: Я в лабораторію, рятувати Доґена.

Source string: Dogen's not in the lab, sweetie. He's watching TV in the lodge with the other children.
Translation: Доґен не в лабораторії, милий. Він дивиться телевізор у хижі разом з іншими.

Source string: I meant the dream Dogen from my Brain Tumbler vision. If I can find out what's happening to him, maybe that would give me a clue about who stole real Dogen's brain.
Translation: Я мав на увазі Доґена з мого мозкотумблерного сну. Якщо з'ясую, що з ним трапилося, це може дати мені підказку, хто вкрав мозок справжнього Доґена.

Source string: Oh, I'm afraid he's just like that.
Translation: Ох, боюсь, він завжди таким був.

Source string: Excuse me, Agent Vodello?
Translation: Перепрошую, агентко Воделло?

Source string: Hello, darling. Are you back for another dance?
Translation: Привіт, серденько. Прийшов на черговий танець?

Source string: That's weird. Those guys just left all their stuff out here. Wonder what happened to them.
What are you guys doing up here?
Oh, heyyyyyy Raz!
Didn't see you there!
We're just looking at the sunset!
(Shh! Just wait until he leaves.)
It is a nice sunset, isn't it?
Hey, Bobby. Wasn't that great when I beat you in that Levitation race?
Hey, Bobby. Someone's stealing kids' brains!
Well in that case, you've got nothing to worry about.
Ah-ha-ha-ha!
Good one.
BECAUSE YOU GOT NO BRAINS!
Yeah.
Hey, Bobby--
Ah ha ha ha! No brains! Ha ha ha!
(Sigh.)
Whoa, uh, Elton. I hope you're not waiting for me.
Translation: Йой, е-е, Елтоне. Сподіваюсь, ти мене не вичікував тут.

Source string: Oh, jeez. Sorry. Carry on, Sailor.
Translation: Ой, боже. Вибачте. Не відволікатиму, моряче.

Source string: Admiral Cruller...
That canoe... are you...
...in love with it?
What? No! I'm just checking it for psychic residue!
Some kind of fish has been tearing holes in our canoes, and I'm trying to pick up its scent.
(Ahh, don't worry now, baby. Nobody's ever going to hurt you again, I promise.)
Wow. What an amazing story.
I mean, that is a really, REALLY good story. And you know what the best part is?
I'm in it!
I'd better go write that whole thing down before we all get killed!
Hey, when Franke gets re-brained, tell her I'm okay, and our date's still on, okay?
I don't want her to worry.
That is some crazy stuff, guys. I'm kind of glad I was out for most of it.
Well, with the world ending and everything, I should probably go see what girls want to make out one last time.
Wow, I never thought YOU two would get back together.
I know! Isn't it just too romantic?
I just hope James won't be too crushed.
Shh. You promised--no talking.
Kinda busy.
Oh my god!
I know!
I mean, OH  MY GOD!
NILS!!!
Um, he's still in the... uh... oh never mind.
...and so I'm really sorry for not believing you.
...right, yeah--that too. I should really not have blown so many of you up. I just get so confused sometimes.
Is Elton okay?
Yeah, he's waiting for you down by the docks.
Gotcha.
Hey, do you want to help us save the--
Typical.
Well, he'll be fully brained soon, I promise.
When he comes out, tell him I'm waiting for him down by the docks, okay?
Is Milka okay?
Yeah, she's waiting for you down by the docks.
Is making out all anyone thinks about in this place?
Well, she'll be fully brained soon, I promise.
Well, when she comes out, tell her I'm waiting for her down by the docks, okay?
Well, there's only one thing that can make this better:
Pedicure. See ya.
Well, I can tell you one thing.
My dad is NEVER going to send me to this camp again.
Where's Kitty? Never mind. I'll find her.
Well, if Brain Tank come after Mikhail, it will be sorry.
Better go find tiny boss, see what is plan.
Tell me, is tiny boss alive?
Yes, and he'll be getting his brain back really soon.
Ah, good. I take advantage of time off to find bear.
Now wire the other end to the gas tank.
Oh, hello Razputin.
What are you guys doing?
Taking care of business. The fewer questions you ask, the better.
Sounds like it's time something bad happened to our fine Coach.
Well, let me tell you what our plan is--
Please. You have your plan. I have mine.
But--
Say no more.
Do away with yourselves?
O-M-G.  I feel so stupid for throwing myself off the roof now!
What? Why'd you throw yourself off the roof?
Because the poison didn't work!
Listen, I have to go. The world could use some major league cheering right about now!
Well shut mah mouth. I'd better go patrol the livin' quarters. Guard the womenfolk 'n' all.
Say, is my hombre walking around yet?
Not yet, but soon!
I just hope he forgives me for actin' like such a dang fool.
Yep. He's free-range.
It's time to circle the wagons, partner. That's the best plan right now.
I'm busy patrollin' the homestead.
With my partner Chops ridin' shotgun!
I just wish Chops was here to ride shotgun!
You know, I'll bet if J.T. wasn't so distracted, this wouldn't have happened.
He's probably with that prissy little show pony right now.
No, actually I think her mind's on other things at the moment.
Hm. Well maybe I'll go see what's up. One of us at least should be guarding the sleeping quarters.
Okay, here's the plan. I'm going to get on the Coach's radio, and call for help.
See, now, that's an excellent idea! Why can't everyone be so helpful?
Yeah, I modified the antenna so now it broadcasts straight into outer space!
Oh man.
...yes, and because you got your brain stolen and I didn't, yes. I do. I think I'm better than you.
Ah ha! I knew it!
Well, you're wrong!
Have fun dying!
Hmm. So does the Coach... does he have an evil sidekick?
A yes man, or a lickspittle?
Anything?
Not sure. Why?
Uh, no reason. Bye!
Oh, man. I just want to burn that Coach!
Hey, where's Quentin?
We're going to be re-braining him really soon.
I have to go hit something. Tell him I went to go hit stuff, okay?
He's waiting for you at band practice.
He better not be painting the wrong band name on my drums again!
Wow. That is so not chill.
Hey, where's Phoebe?
We're gonna be re-braining her really soon.
Well, when she comes out, she's going to want to hit stuff. I'd better go wait by her drums.
She's waiting for you at band practice.
Awesome. Okay, check you out later, my bros.
Listen, you gotta help. You gotta kill me, son. I can't take the cheering anymore.
I'm sorry I put their brains back. Maybe a bear will get them soon.
Maybe. If not, you gotta find my drain cleaner and pour it down my throat, okay?
Mr. Cruller, there's a big mess that you gotta help me clean up!
Really? Where? I'll get the jet!
People are missing, kids' brains have been stolen, Coach Oleander is trying to take over the world...
Aw psh! Not my kind of mess.
Won't you help?
I'm a janitor. Let me know when somebody drops a carton of eggs or something.
Admiral, sir! Did you hear that? The Hideous Hulking Lungfish of Lake Oblongata just kidnapped Lili!
LUNGFISH?!
So THAT'S what's been tearing up my canoes!
Well, I know just what to do!
You do? Great!
Yeah, I've got some lungfish-proof shellac. I'll just slap on a fresh coat, maybe two, and that's that!
Admiral, the monster is still out there, and Coach Oleander is trying to take over the world!
Ah, yes, the world is a crazy place, son. But don't worry.
The canoes are safe.

Mr. Cruller, you gotta help! Kids are getting kidnapped, and everyone's missing, and their brains are stolen, and I think the Coach is trying to take over the world with Psychically-armed death tanks!
Well, now you see what happens when you go to parts of the forest that are off limits?
I'm a Ranger. I've got enough problems wrangling these leaves! Now git!
Wow, I guess that's what those squirrels were trying to tell me.
Huh?
They kept saying, "The tiny man is going to kill everyone."
I thought they were talking about me!
Oh man. I have to go apologize.
Hmm. Looks like one of the buttons is missing.
Translation: Гм-м. Схоже, тут бракує ґудзика.

Source string: Call me crazy, but I have a weird feeling that the button Sasha gave me goes here.
Translation: Нічого не хочу сказати, але щось мені підказує, Сашин ґудзик сюди встане як рідний.

Source string: Heh heh heh.
Translation: Хе-хе-хе.

Source string: Move RIGHT {Joystick} to look around.
Translation: Рухайте ПРАВИЙ {Joystick}, щоб оглядатися.

Source string: Okay, quick eye exam before we start.
Translation: Отож, хутко пробіжимось основами.

Source string: Look over that way if you will.
Translation: Будь добрий, подивися туди.

Source string: No, that way.
Translation: Ні, отуди.

Source string: Look over there.
Translation: Дивись туди.

Source string: Over there.
Translation: Он туди.

Source string: Clocks a-tickin', Sonny!
Translation: Годинник цокає, синку!

Source string: Wow, what's that?
Translation: Йой, що це?

Source string: That's a PSI CHALLENGE MARKER. The staff scatters these all over the camp to test the students. Every one of these you find advances you a whole rank.
Translation: Це ПСИМАРКЕР. Персонал розкидає їх по всьому табору, щоб перевірити учнів. За кожен зібраний ти отримуєш підвищення рангу.

Source string: Ah ha...
Translation: От воно що...

Source string: Now, look up for me if you will.
Translation: А тепер, поглянь вище.

Source string: Move right thumbstick [vertical joystick icon] to look up.
Up. Up there.
Translation: Вище. Вище дивись.

Source string: Come on.
Translation: Ну ж бо.

Source string: You see where I'm pointing?
Translation: Бачиш, куди я показую?

Source string: Hmmm…
Translation: Гм-м-м...

Source string: Some of the old markers have fallen apart. You'll find bits of 'em flapping around loose.
Translation: Деякі старі маркери могли розвалитися. Але частинки досі пурхають неподалік.

Source string: If you find enough of these PSI CARDS, you can put 'em together to make a brand new Challenge Marker...
Translation: Якщо знайдеш достатньо ПСИКАРТ, зможеш зібрати їх до купи та зробити новий псимаркер...

Source string: ...But you have to buy a PSI CORE at the camp store to hold them together.
Translation: Але спочатку доведеться придбати ПСІЯДРО в табірній крамниці, інакше вони не триматимуться.

Source string: Keep ranking up and before you know it you'll be able to use brand new psychic powers. Stuff you didn't even know you could do.
Translation: Підвищуй свій ранг і навіть не помітиш, як тобі стануть доступні нові психічні здібності. Сили, про які ти навіть не здогадувався.

Source string: And then when do I become a Psychonaut?
Translation: І коли ж я стану психонавтом?

Source string: Because I have to do that before my dad shows up to take me home...
Translation: Бо мені треба встигнути до того, як тато забере мене додому...

Source string: Hey, where'd he go?
Translation: Гей, куди він дівся?

Source string: That guy looked so familiar...
Translation: Когось він мені нагадав...

Source string: Hey, why are you trying to firestart me, Raz?
Don't be a dork. Go burn something else.
If you don't stop trying to burn me right now I am going to SCREAM!
Quit it!
Go burn someone who cares.
Stop trying to burn me, creep!
Thanks, but I am warm enough in my thick, Russian hat.
This burning choice you've made is a poor one, Razputin.
Is this how you tell girls you have a crush on them? It's annoying.
Right on, Raz! You learned firestarting! Good for you!
Hee hee hee! Yay! Firestarting practice! Woo!
Move along, little doggy. Nothin' to burn here.
Careful, eh? My hair goes up in flames and we're all goners.
Hm. Atmospheric changes in effect. Adjusting helmet thermostat.
Man, what is that smell?
My ears are burning. Kitty must be talking about me!
Oh man. I hope I don't get much hotter. That would be uncomfortable.
Oh no. Is my problem back? Have to calm down. Can't burn anything. Cannot burn anything!
Ooh, feels like Phoebe's having another flare up!
I'm sure you could find a more productive use for that skill, Razputin.
Please, this is polyester. I'm hot enough!
Save it for the battlefield, soldier.
Hey, put me down!
Drop me or I will drop you!
Hey! Grow up, Razputin!
I'm not supposed to get wild at camp!
Grrrr!
Hey, put me down or my dad will sue your whole family!
Put me down or Kitty's dad will sue your whole family!
Hm. Thanks for the boost. But no, still can see no bears from up here.
What are you trying to prove, Raz?
I'm going to be quiet and hope that you just go away.
Haha! Yay! Raz learned Telekinesis! Right on!
Wow, you're really good at Telekinesis, Raz! That's awesome!
Put me down partner or I'll show you what a good shot I am!
What's this all about, eh?
Finally! I'm being TAKEN! They've finally come for me! Hey! It's just you. PUT ME DOWN!
Oh, that was your fatal mistake. I hope you have a will.
Lemme down! Lemme down!
Okay, I really don't like being up this high.
Hey! Rrrrr! Enough! Hello! Put me down!
Hey, free airplane rides today!
Impressive. Now release.
I was already floating Razputin. That's hardly a challenge.
Okay, that's funny. Now PUT ME DOWN.
What the--ha! That's some mind you got there, kid. If you want to keep it, I suggest you put me down.
Oooh-ooooh...
I am not so easily confused, Razputin.
There are other ways to meet girls, Razputin.
I told you them burgers ain't ready!
This part of the forest is off limits! Now git!
Stop starin' at my mops!
You will call me ADMIRAL, Sonny!
Oooh-ooooh... Mr. Bun, where you going? Ohhhh…
Hey can I buy some stuff?
Translation: Можна у вас дещо купити?

Source string: Yeah, but hurry up. I don't want to burn my burgers.
Translation: Так, але хутко. А то котлети спалю.

Source string: Dream Fluff
Translation: Снолодощі

Source string: Mmmm. Dream Fluffs! Delicious, nutritious and cheap!
Translation: М-м-м-м. Снолодощі! Смачні, поживні та дешеві!

Source string: Each one is packed with concentrated mental health!
Translation: Кожна цукерка наповнена ментальним здоров'ям!

Source string: You shouldn't go anywhere without a pocket full of those!
Translation: Набивай ними кишені, перед тим, як іти в подорож!

Source string: PSI Core
Translation: Псіядро

Source string: Now you take that PSI CORE there...
Translation: Отже, якщо ти візьмеш ПСІЯДРО...

Source string: Put it together with nine PSI CARDS, and you'll have yourself a brand new PSI Challenge Marker!
Translation: Поєднай його з дев'ятьма ПСИКАРТАМИ, і отримаєш новенький ПСИМАРКЕР!

Source string: Which is worth a whole rank, you know.
Translation: А він дає цілий ранг, якщо ти не знав.

Source string: Cobweb Duster
Translation: Павутиноочисник

Source string: Rank requirement: 15
Oh that's my last Cobweb Duster.
Translation: О-о, це мій останній ПАВУТИНООЧИСНИК.

Source string: Take that into someone's mind with ya, you can clean up!
Translation: Візьми його із собою в чийсь розум, де давно не прибирали!

Source string: They're happy to be rid of the webs, and you can turn them in for PSI Cards!
Translation: Вони отримають чисту від павутин свідомість, а ти — псикарти!

Source string: Dowsing Rod
Translation: Біолокаційні рамки

Source string: Rank Requirement: 10
Now that Dowsing Rod will help you find arrowheads that are buried DEEP.
Translation: Ці БІОЛОКАЦІЙНІ РАМКИ допоможуть знайти наконечники, закопані десь УГЛИБИНІ.

Source string: That's where all the really valuable ones are, you know.
Translation: А вони набагато цінніші за звичайні. Задумайся.

Source string: Find three or four deep deposits and that baby pays for itself.
Translation: Знайдеш три-чотири глибинних скупчень, і вважай, що ти вже їх окупив.

Source string: It costs you money because it MAKES you money!
Translation: Вони коштують грошей, бо ЗАРОБЛЯЮТЬ гроші!

Source string: PSI Energy Colorizer
Translation: Псіенергетичний барвник

Source string: Rank Requirement: 40
Now with that, you can change the color of some of your PSI powers, like your Levitation Ball, and what have you and whatnot.
Translation: З ним ти зможеш міняти колір деяких своїх псиздібностей, наприклад, левітації, чи що там у тебе є.

Source string: Well. kind of a vanity thing. In my day PSI powers were all gray and we thought that was grand. We were happy just to HAVE PSI powers. Ah, but you know kids these days.
Translation: Як на мене, це вже наглість. У мої часи всі псиздібності були сірі, і нам цього вистачало за очі. Ми просто були раді, що ВОНИ В НАС Є. Ну, що поробиш, таке вже нове покоління.

Source string: Posters
Eh, got some posters here.
Translation: Е-е, є в мене кілька плакатів.

Source string: You can hang 'em in your cabin.
Translation: Можеш повісити їх у себе в хатинці.

Source string: Makes it just like home!
Translation: Почуватимешся як удома!

Source string: Hey, can you put that on my tab?
Translation: Гей, може ви ненадовго позичите?

Source string: Ah, sorry, mac. No can do. We only trade in hard, cold, Psitanium Arrowheads here.
Translation: Вибачайте, але в нас так не заведено. Торгівля здійснюється тільки гострими, холодними наконечниками з пситанію.

Source string: If you don't have enough, why don't you run around outside a bit and dig some up?
Translation: Якщо їх бракує, то піди погуляй, повикопуй. Їх вистачить на всіх.

Source string: Or crack open some mental vaults. Always something valuable in a vault!
Translation: Або зламай декілька ментальних сейфів. У них завжди є щось цінне!

Source string: I don't have enough arrowheads for that!
Translation: Мені не вистачає наконечників!

Source string: Well then, quit lookin' at it!
Translation: Ну то нащо ти дивишся?!

Source string: Ah, it doesn't look like you've got the rank you need there, kiddo.
Translation: Ех, для такого твій ранг ще замалий, юначе.

Source string: And there's no excuse for that! Plenty of ways to get promoted around here!
Translation: Тобі самому не соромно? Є ж стільки способів його підвищити!

Source string: Collecting mental figments and cobwebs helps you rank up. So does finding PSI challenge markers, or building them out of PSI cards and cores.
Translation: Збирання ментальних вигадок та павутин допоможе. Також не забувай знаходити псимаркери або робити їх із псикарт і ядер.

Source string: You also rank up when you sort people's emotional baggage, and if you want to skip a bunch of ranks at once, well you should talk to the camp Ranger about his Scavenger Hunt contest.
Translation: Також твоєму рангу сприяє возз'єднання емоційного багажу. А якщо хочеш одразу перестрибнути на декілька рангів уперед, поговори з рейнджером табору щодо «погоні за мотлохом».

Source string: I don't have a high enough rank to buy that yet!
Translation: Мій ранг недостатньо високий для цього!

Source string: Not yet. But maybe in a few years.
Translation: Ну, може через пару років доросте.

Source string: I'll take it!
Translation: Візьму!

Source string: Alrighty then.
Translation: Як скажеш.

Source string: Excellent choice!
Translation: Прекрасний вибір!

Source string: Sold! To the big-headed kid with the gloves!
Translation: Продано! Великоголовому хлопцю в рукавичках!

Source string: What else can I do you for?
Translation: Чим іще можу допомогти?

Source string: That's it for now.
Translation: На цьому поки все.

Source string: Alright. Go get more arrowheads and come on back.
Translation: Добренько. Запасися наконечниками та повертайся.

Source string: Support your local merchants!
Translation: Підтримайте місцеву торгівлю!

Source string: Oof! Hey...
Translation: Уф! Що за...

Source string: Welcome to the Whispering Rocket Underground Rapid Transit System.
Translation: Ласкаво просимо до системи швидкісного метро «Шепітка Глибочінь».

Source string: Would you like to go back to your private sanctuary now, Agent Cruller? Or... somewhere else?
Translation: Бажаєте повернутися у свій особистий грот, агенте Круллер? Чи... кудись ще?

Source string: Where would you like me to take you, Agent Cruller?
Translation: Куди вас відвезти, агенте Круллер?

Source string: Take me to the Kids' Cabins area.
Translation: Підкинь мене до дитячих хатинок.

Source string: With pleasure.
Translation: Із задоволенням.

Source string: Drop me outside the main lodge.
Translation: Висади мене біля центральної хижі.

Source string: Oh, bring me back a burger this time, will you?
Translation: О, захопите мені гамбургер, добре?

Source string: I'm headed for the parking lot.
Translation: Мені треба на стоянку.

Source string: I hope you're not leaving us, sir.
Translation: Ви ж не залишаєте табір, правда, сер?

Source string: I want to go to the campfire area.
Translation: Цього разу хочу до головного багаття.

Source string: Mmm. You look so cute in that janitor outfit!
Translation: М-м-м. Ви такий миленький у вбранні прибиральника!

Source string: Let's go to Ford's--I mean, MY sanctuary.
Translation: До грота Форда...  тобто, МОГО грота.

Source string: Yes, noble Psychomaster.
Translation: Буде виконано, мій шляхетний психомайстре.

Source string: It's time to go to the lake!
Translation: Час їхати до озера!

Source string: Yessir, Admiral Sir!
Translation: Так точно, сер-адмірал!

Source string: Bring me near the Geodesic Psychoisolation Chamber.
Translation: Мені треба до Геодезичної психоізоляційної камери.

Source string: Roger that, Ranger Cruller!
Translation: Прийнято, рейнджере Круллер!

Source string: Nowhere! I just like to come down here to hear your voice.
Translation: Нікуди! Я спустився просто щоб послухати твій голос.

Source string: Pop in anytime, sir.
Translation: Завжди вам рада, сер.

Source string: Is that the cleaning lady?
Translation: Прибиральнице, то ви?

Source string: I'll get those files out of your way, just as soon as I'm done with these... tests...
Translation: Я поприбираю ті документи, як тільки покінчу із цими... іспитами...

Source string: Ah, yes. Thank you Razputin, for helping me clean up.
Translation: О, так. Дякую, що допомагаєш із прибиранням, Разпутіне.

Source string: Is this going to hurt?
Have you tested this thing out on humans yet?
Will I get in trouble with Milla? She told me not to take any paranormal training while I'm here.
Could you try it first?
Okay, I'm ready to learn how to really fight!
Translation: Що ж, я готовий навчитися справжньої боротьби!

Source string: Oh. Really? Hm.
Translation: О. Справді? Гм.

Source string: What?
Translation: Що?

Source string: Uh, nothing. It's just that I didn't think you'd really take me up on that offer. It usually scares the kids off.
Translation: Е-е, нічого. Просто не думав, що ти приймеш мою пропозицію. Зазвичай дітей це відлякує.

Source string: Well, not me. I'm ready to kill for my camp!
Translation: Але не мене. Я готовий убивати за свій табір!

Source string: Listen, I'm sorry, but I can't train you. Agent Vodello would kill me.
Translation: Слухай, мені шкода, але я не можу тебе тренувати. Агентка Воделло мене приб'є.

Source string: What's the big deal? What she doesn't know won't hurt her.
Translation: А в чому проблема? Не розповідайте їй і вона не приб'є.

Source string: You don't even have a Marksmanship Learner's Permit. I could lose my job!
Translation: У тебе навіть немає дозволу на навчання стрільбі. Мене такими темпами звільнять!

Source string: I'll get one!
Translation: Я дістану його!

Source string: Even if you used that secret passage over there and snuck into his sanctuary...
Translation: Навіть якби ти скористався тим секретним проходом і пробрався в його грот...

Source string: Agent Cruller would never give you a Marksmanship Learner's permit.
Translation: Агент Круллер ніколи не дасть тобі дозвіл на навчання стрільбі.

Source string: Agent Cruller...
Translation: Агент Круллер...

Source string: Never in a million--
Translation: Нізащо в жи...

Source string: I'm off! Be right back after I talk with Agent Cruller!
Translation: Я пішов! Поговорю з агентом Круллером і повернуся!

Source string: Did you convince Agent Cruller to give you a Marksmanship Learner's Permit yet?
Translation: Ти вже переконав агента Круллера дати тобі дозвіл на навчання стрільбі?

Source string: Oh... uh... yes. But I left it in my other pants. Be right back.
Translation: Ой... е-е... так. Я забув його в інших штанах. Я скоро.

Source string: Okay I got it. Check it out.
Translation: Ось він. Дивіться.

Source string: Well my ass is covered.
Translation: Тепер моя дупа прикрита.

Source string: Are you sure you are ready to do this? It could be dangerous.
Translation: Ти певен, що готовий до цього? Це може бути небезпечно.

Source string: Yes! Are you going to pull me into your mind like the Coach did?
Translation: Так! Ви мене затягнете у свій розум, прямо як тренер?

Source string: Ha. No offense, but it's time you saw what an organized mind looks like.
Translation: Ха. Без образ, але час побачити, як виглядає організований розум.

Source string: Almost! I just have to get my affairs in order first.
Translation: Ну, майже! Спочатку я завершу інші справи.

Source string: Just in case I die.
Translation: На випадок, якщо помру.

Source string: Come back when you are ready.
Translation: Повертайся, коли будеш готовий.

Source string: Okay, time to face my big, diving-helmet spitting personal demons.
Translation: Що ж, час зіткнутися з моїми шоломоплювальними демонами віч-на-віч.

Source string: That's the spirit.
Translation: Так тримати.

Source string: Okay, I'm a certified levitator now. Ready to roll.
Hmm.
I've been running some tests. It seems that the sensitive circuitry of the Brain Tumbler is picking up too much psychic interference to be safe.
The thoughts of some other entity are interlacing with yours at a dangerous level, which explains many of the strange things you've seen.
I must call off the experiments until we know more.
Sasha, there's no time. I think my vision about Dogen came true. I'm worried it's going to happen to the others if we don't get to the bottom of this quick.
But we don't know where the foreign projections are coming from yet.
Is there a faster way to find out than sending me in there to investigate?
Wow. Is this what the inside of my mind looks like?
Translation: Йой. Це я вже всередині свого розуму?

Source string: Not yet. You are still traveling through the astral plane.
Translation: Ще ні. Ти досі подорожуєш астральним планом.

Source string: This is a tiny corner of what we call the Collective Unconscious--a place in which all of our unconscious minds are connected.
Translation: Це невеликий закуток так званого «колективного несвідомого»: місця, де з'єднуються всі людські психіки.

Source string: You have just begun your training, Razputin, so many of the connections with other minds are still not developed for you, and those doorways remain just out of reach.
Translation: Ти лише на початку свого тренування, Разпутіне, тож зв'язок із багатьма розумами ще не встановлений. Відповідно, ці двері лишаються зачиненими.

Source string: But the more you explore the mental world, the more connections you will form.
Translation: Але чим більше ти досліджуватимеш ментальний світ, тим більше формуватимеш зв'язків.

Source string: Right now the only unconscious world you can enter is that one.
Translation: Наразі єдина підсвідомість, доступна тобі, ось ця.

Source string: Your own.
Translation: Твоя власна.

Source string: Step through it and we'll continue.
Translation: Заходь у неї та ми продовжимо.

Source string: Oof!
Translation: Уф!

Source string: Hi. I'm here for Basic Braining?
They seem to all be in a trance while they astrally project themselves into the Coach's psyche.
Translation: Схоже, вони знаходяться в трансі, коли астрально проєктують себе у свідомість тренера.

Source string: Which is awesome.
Shut up!
Translation: Замовкніть!

Source string: I am not!
Translation: Я не такий!

Source string: I wouldn't!
Translation: Та я б ніколи!

Source string: I'm not going to do that!
Translation: Я не робитиму цього!

Source string: You squirrels think you're so smart!
Translation: Ви, білки, думаєте, що розумніші за всіх!

Source string: Ooooh! I'm so cool. I'm a squirrel.
Translation: У-у-у-у! Дивіться, я білка. Я така крута.

Source string: Well you know what we call you? Rats with wings.
Translation: Знаєте, як ми вас називаємо? Крилаті щури.

Source string: Well, then we call you something else. Nut rats!
Translation: Але можемо називати й інакше. Горіхові щури!

Source string: Fluffy rats!
Translation: Пухнасті щури!

Source string: And what's that supposed to mean?
Translation: І як це розуміти?

Source string: It's a special hat, and you should be glad I'm wearing it!
Translation: Це спецкапелюх. Вам пощастило, що він на мені!

Source string: No!
Translation: Ні!

Source string: Never!
Translation: Ніколи!

Source string: I do too understand what you're saying, and I don't appreciate it!
Translation: Я розумію про що ви, але думки ваші не поділяю!

Source string: You guys are making me so mad!
Translation: Ви мене так дістали!

Source string: Quit it! You'll knock off my special hat!
Translation: Припини! А то скинеш з мене капелюх!

Source string: Hey, sorry about hitting you a minute ago. That was totally an accident.
Translation: Гей, вибач, що вдарив тебе хвилину тому. Я випадково, чесно.

Source string: Oh, okay, Raz. I know you wouldn't do that on purpose.
Translation: О, добре, Разе. Я знаю, що ти ненавмисно.

Source string: What are they lying to you about, anyway?
Translation: І про що вони тобі там брешуть?

Source string: Nothing!
Translation: Ні про що!

Source string: Hey, what happened to the squirrels?
Translation: Гей, а що сталося з білками?

Source string: They lied. They lied... and then--then--then they--they left.
Translation: Вони брехали. Брехали... а-а-а потім, а потім вони просто пішли.

Source string: You're lucky I'm not burning people any more.
Not cool, bro.
Grow up.
Earthling violence is why we haven't been asked to join the greater galactic community, you know.
Hmmm.
Grrrr.
(Sigh.)
Quit it, Bobby! I know that's you! Jerk.
Translation: Припини, Боббі! Я знаю, що це ти! Козел.

Source string: Ah, thanks for offer, but only want to fight bear today.
Translation: А, вдячний за твій виклик, але сьогодні я зосереджений на ведмедях.

Source string: Mikhail will find you.
That's not how true Psychonauts behave, Razputin.
Can't you see I'm busy here?
(Grunt.)
Raz, I'm sorry but that's not how you play this game.
Now I'm NEVER going to show you how to do this, jerk!
(...mutter...)
Nils?
Nils!
Nils...
Uh…
Ummmmm…
I dunno.
Just ignore him, Dogen. He's trying to nose his way into our private conversation.
But...
Eep.
Eek.
Grk.
Just ignore him, Franke.
WAAAAAAAH!
Hey!
Is anybody out there?
Let me out!
Hellllllp!
Somebody!
There's no bathroom in here!
Hey, quit it!
Ow. You're lucky you're no good at that yet.
Hey! You make me chip a tooth on this mouth harp and there's gonna be a showdown!
Careful eh? I just got this thing in tune!
Ha ha ha!
Translation: Ха-ха-ха!

Source string: Look at him squirm!
Translation: Диви як борсається!

Source string: That's the funniest thing I ever saw!
Translation: Нічого смішніше в житті не бачив!

Source string: I think I'm going to puke that's so funny.
Translation: Так весело, що мене зараз вирве.

Source string: Stupid fish!
Translation: Тупа ти риба!

Source string: Think you're better than us cuz you can swim?
Translation: Думаєш, ти крутіше за нас, раз умієш плавати?

Source string: So funny!
Translation: Сміхота!

Source string: Good one, Bobby!
Translation: Ото ти задав їй, Боббі!

Source string: You've got the best ideas, Bobby!
Translation: У тебе завжди найкращі ідеї, Боббі!

Source string: Yeah, stupid fish!
Translation: Ага, тупа ти риба!

Source string: Man, do I hate fish!
Translation: Як же я ненавиджу риб!

Source string: Oh, no you don't!
Translation: Нє-є, куди зібралася!

Source string: Oopsy daisy!
Translation: Упс!

Source string: Elton. Ask if any of them have lost a big red button.
Ah, eager to get whacked on the head with a broom handle too, I see!
Hey! I should wring you out like a wet mop!
How about I clean your clock instead of the floor, eh?
I will flip you like a half-done burger, boy.
Translation: Я тебе підкину мов напівсмажену котлету, хлопче.

Source string: I will take out your intestines, fry 'em into hash browns, and sew 'em back into your body before you ever get the chance to try that again!
Translation: Я витягну з тебе кишки, посмажу їх до хрусткої скоринки, зашию назад у твоє тіло, перед тим, як ти встигнеш зробити це знову!

Source string: How'd you like to be branded with a hot spatula, eh?
Translation: Не хочеш собі на тілі відбиток розпеченої лопатки, а?

Source string: I will take one of these paddles to your psychic behind if you don't knock that off!
I will sink you so deep in that lake, no dredge crew would ever find ya.
I'll make a canoe out of your hide, if you try that one more time!
Ow!
Aye!
I will rake you into the next dimension if you don't knock that off.
I will whittle you into a neckerchief holder in two seconds, you hear me?
I know places in these woods, I could hide a body so nobody would find it, ever.
I will burn you like a pile of autumn leaves if you do that again.
Shhh! You'll tip off my target.
Don't tell anyone I'm out here!
Roger.
You see those guys?
Nope.
Hm.
Hey are you guys getting back together?
Hey, only I get to hit him!
Hey, if I can't hit her, neither can you!
Hey, what's on?
What do you like better, TV or air?
Hey, do you happen to know the country code for Tuvalu?
First question: What do you think the queen is drinking right now? Second question: What was your favorite science fiction miniseries in the eighties?
TEE VEE!
Oh, man. These guys are all getting Advanced Levitation training while I'm just standing here!
Yeah. I remember back when I was still in Levitation class.
Heck yeah! Let me at them doggies!
Okay then, let's see some fancy shootin!
Nah, I don't feel like shooting right now. I've got a headache.
Ah, me too.
Is yours named Elka Doom too?
Ah ha ha.
Wait. She's not around these parts, is she?
Hey, not bad city slicker!
Bull's-eye!
Hooooo dawg!
Nice job!
Good shootin!
Aw, next time.
That was close!
Oooh, too bad.
Steady...
If that was a rustler, he'd a gotten away!
I, uh, haven't told Bobby to lay off the fish torture yet, but I'm going to.
Uh-huh.
Okay, if you guys need me I'm going to be studying Levitation with Milla Vodello.
The Mental Minx?
Yes, I'd like to practice some more on the Levitation course.
Translation: Так, хочу ще потренуватися на курсі левітації.

Source string: Well... class is over. But the party never ends!
Translation: Що ж... урок закінчився, а от вечірка — ні!

Source string: No, I'm here to warn you.  I think there is a monster in the lake!
Translation: Ні, я хочу вас попередити. Здається, в озері живе чудовисько!

Source string: You mean the Hideous Hulking Lungfish of Lake Oblongata?
Translation: Ти про гидку велетенську дводишну рибу Довгастого озера?

Source string: Darling, every summer camp has its stories. But that's all they are.
Translation: Серденько, у всіх таборах є місцеві байки. Ключове слово — «байки».

Source string: This one ate Dogen's brains.
Translation: Вона з'їла мізки Доґена.

Source string: Now, stop spreading rumors. I know Dogen seems a little... naive... but he is actually a very powerful psychic.
Translation: Слухай, не треба поширювати чутки. Знаю, що Доґен здається дещо... наївним... але насправді він дуже сильний екстрасенс.

Source string: You know what it's like to stand out, Razputin, so maybe you could help him out, eh?
Translation: Я знаю, як це, бути не такою як усі, Разпутіне. То може ти його підтримаєш, м?

Source string: Well, I just wanted to stop by and say hi.
Translation: Та просто заскочив привітатися.

Source string: Oh, how nice. Isn't it a lovely day? It just seems like on a beautiful day like this, nothing could go wrong, you know?
Translation: Ой, як ввічливо з твого боку. Покращуєш і без того чудовий день. У такий прекрасний день нічого не може піти не так, правда ж?

Source string: Oh, now Raz, you made me lose my place. Where was I, girls?
Oh well. Guess I have to start over at the beginning!
(Ahem ahem.)
Vernon, you keep watch over these guys while I try to find their brains. I'm going back to Sasha's Lab now to find out what's going on.
Take your time. I've got a lot of really good stories.
Hey, there's this whole brain-stealing thing going on that you should know about.
Razputin? NOT NOW.
Hey, not right now, okay Raz?
Chicks.
Tell me about it.
Maybe these guys are better off without their brains. They seem so nice now.
You're not going to, uh, kill Benny, are you?
Difficult to say.
Hey, you guys aren't going around taking people's brains out, are you?
Not yet, but maybe we should do some market research on that, and see if there's a demand for that service.
Quit it! I'm trying to hear something!
Hey, J.T. I could use a hired gun on this brain-stealing case I'm working on.
Huh? Oh, sorry Raz. I'm a little preoccupied right now. Got a lot of figurin' to do.
You should take advantage of this time to quietly reflect upon your life, Benny.
Raz, buddy! You gotta help me!
Not NOW, Raz!
Hey, you guys want to go do something?
Watch TV or something?
Want to help me find Dogen's brains?
They're missing.
Mmf. No, he's just like that. Mffm.
I, uh, I beat Bobby in this Levitation race. It was pretty cool.
I got a, uh... Oarsman's Badge, so I can get us a canoe if you guys want to go... canoeing.
Have you guys ever jumped down these big, hollow stumps they have all around camp?
No?
Okay, ummm, I'm gonna go back to Sasha's secret lab now. If you guys need me, that's where I'll be.
Yes! I got a brain!
Well, the good thing about you finding that kid's brain--besides the whole thinking and feeling they'll be able to do now--
is that they will be adding their subconscious mental attention to your quest, and their energy will increase your mental health potential!
That sounds great, but is the surgery going to be dangerous?
Nothing's dangerous when you have the right tools.
Messy, yes, but not dangerous.
...and so that's what happened to your brain.
...and that's how the Coach is planning to take over the world.
...so that's who's been kidnapping all the kids.
...and that's why we have to find Lili right away.
...so, any questions?
...and so that's why, even though she is a girl, and we are good friends, she is not, technically, my "girlfriend."
...and that is how I beat the Hideous, Hulking Lungfish of Lake Oblongata.
...and then the Lungfish ate me and we became best friends.
...and that's why finding your brain in particular was my highest priority.
...so, as you can imagine, we are in some bad trouble.
...that's a good question. But I didn't taste it, so I don't really know the answer for sure.
...and that's why we need your help more than anybody's.
...and so--long story short--we're hoping for the best, but preparing for the worst.
...and that's how I earned all my merit badges.
Scared? You'd better believe I was scared. You'd have to be a fool not to be. But the trick is to never let them see you sweat!
...so I said, "Brainer? I don't even know her!" Ha ha!
...no, you can't have the bracelet. She made it for me.
...no, I promise you. You didn't drool at all.
...The end!
Not now Raz. I'm trying to finish writing my memoirs before we all die.
Hey, want to help me save the world?
Oh man. Gotta work a little turtle with a crown into the story somehow. Hm. Maybe he can be my little wisecracking sidekick.
Don't you have a world to save or something?
Maybe after I get just a couple good, end of the world hook up sessions in, okay?
I thought this would be a good spot. This is where I hooked up with what's her name the first time. Elka.
Mister? Don't you have any FEMALE friends you can introduce me to?
Pig!
Please, I want to be alone. Here on this spot where Nils and I first spoke of our love.
Can't you see that we're too busy being in love?
Oh, Mr. Pokeylope. I wish I had a hard shell like yours. Around my heart.
Hey, I said I was sorry!
Well, this could take a while. They're really mad.
Hi. I like your hat.
Ow.
I'm going to wait for Milka to show up. She always knows what to do.
Mmmf. Later. Mmmlf.
Mmmf. Hi. Mmmlf.
Quit it! This polish isn't dry yet!
HMM... nope.
Pff. My dad bought me a bigger turtle than that for my birthday.
Ahhh!
HMM… nope.
Glad you finally got a friend.
Shall I come out and hurt people?
No, keep working.
We are. This is how we handle things, in my family.
Seems like a nice turtle. You shouldn't get him involved in this mess, Raz.
Yay! Mr. Cruller!
Mop! Mop! Mop!
Mooooooop, hurray!
Mop, moppy mop-mop!
Mop, Mr. Cruller, Mop!
Moppity moppity manamanop-mop!
Hey, if there's one thing the world needs, it's cheer.
Cheerleaders save the world one smile at a time!
Yayyy! Wooo!
Three cheers for Mr. Pokeylope!
Hip, hip, hurray!
Hip, hip, hurrayyy!
Nice to meet you, Mr. Lope. Better keep that little head tucked away until we give the all-clear.
Thanks. Gotta stay awake when you're on patrol!
I'm just going to save this little part of it right here.
With my man over there riding shotgun!
I just wish J.T. was here riding shotgun.
Better go put that little guy somewhere safe. There's a war on right now you know.
